name: ezmediafiredl
description: It's a package that downloads a file or an entire folder from mediafire.com. If you submit a file link it will automatically extract its key and download it inside 'output' folder. And if you submit a folder link it will automatically extract its key, scan its subfolders (recursively) and files and will download them.
author: DaniTRDev / OsiKaSuKe
